query:
SELECT 
  'Published Journeys' as feature,
  COUNT(*) as available_count
FROM journeys
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Journey Days with Content',
  COUNT(*)
FROM journeyDays
WHERE content IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Paradoxes Available',
  COUNT(*)
FROM paradoxes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Life Experiments Available',
  COUNT(*)
FROM life_experiments
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Micro Retreats Available',
  COUNT(*)
FROM micro_retreats
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Deep Questions Available',
  COUNT(*)
FROM deepQuestions;
